Text: Nearly half of Utah‚Äôs Navajo Nation does not have running water in their homes. Appreciate @SecDebHaaland's work in implementing funds provided from our bipartisan infrastructure bill to fulfill critical water needs for tribal communities in Utah.https://t.co/f5FFUCfF87

Thanks to our responsible state and local leaders, Utah remains one of the best-managed states in the country‚Äìa quality I strive to emulate in Washington. Honored to speak with the Utah legislature on our efforts to support the unique needs of our state here at home and in D.C. https://t.co/wkAYs8tbep

Americans who rely on federal programs, like Medicare and Social Security, could be cut off from their benefits if our federal trust funds go bankrupt. In order to save these programs, we must solve our imbalances. The TRUST Act is the right place to start. https://t.co/c4UnMgdtb3

Our bipartisan infrastructure bill includes clear provisions for upgraded and expanded surface transportation systems, which are critical to growing states like Utah. The Administration must implement our bill faithfully to the legislative text. https://t.co/MvyVpMqChK

Federal trust funds, which finance some of our most important federal programs, are on the brink of insolvency. For America to remain strong, we must salvage our fiscal health. Our debt must not overwhelm our nation's capacity to provide for itself and remain a global leader. https://t.co/ZaNd0jkbBv

Throughout history, a leading characteristic of failed nations has been spending excessive amounts of borrowed money. China is on track to surpass the U.S. economically, militarily, and geopolitically. To keep America strong for years to come, we must address our debt crisis. https://t.co/3YmhHX2AyD

Debt and insolvency are major threats to our nation‚Äôs security and economic wellbeing. I introduced the bipartisan TRUST Act to help us change course‚Äîestablishing rescue committees to examine each of our endangered federal trust funds and develop saving solutions. https://t.co/m8F8vMQwsD

Americans are struggling with high inflation. The Administration should never have spent massive amounts of COVID relief dollars when states were already flush with funds. That, coupled with the Federal Reserve‚Äôs inaction on rates, has only worsened our nation‚Äôs fiscal crisis. https://t.co/peOVodZmz3

Congratulations to Salt Lake‚Äôs @BrittanyBowe on her bronze medal. She is a true embodiment of what it means to be a @TeamUSA Olympic athlete and a leader‚Äîand we could not be more proud üá∫üá∏ https://t.co/4GufTWYvhJ

Vaccinated people are far less likely to be hospitalized or die from COVID-19, but breakthrough cases are still possible. It‚Äôs imperative that the Administration support the development of next-generation vaccines, particularly as new variants emerge.https://t.co/yQwu6KPI0y

The CCP‚Äôs atrocities against its minorities‚Äîparticularly the Uyghur people‚Äîinclude genocide and crimes against humanity. Met with @EnesFreedom to discuss China‚Äôs human rights abuses and our shared gratitude to live in a country that honors freedom of expression. https://t.co/9HbH3phVEc

From Garland, Utah, to the skies over Berlin, ‚ÄòCandy Bomber‚Äô Colonel Gail S. Halvorsen epitomized the defining characteristics of the Greatest Generation. May he ever remind us that hope always exists, even in our darkest hour. Rest in peace to one of the world‚Äôs finest men. https://t.co/0VZiZduzbe
Keeping these @HAFB Airmen in our prayers as they deploy to Germany. Thank you for your service and commitment to protecting our democratic values abroad. https://t.co/OwMdu4YBN0

The Uinta Basin Railway will be key to the region‚Äôs economic future. Met with Duchesne County Commissioner Greg Todd and County Recorder & @uac29 President Shelly Brennan for an update on the railway project. Grateful for their efforts to foster further economic development. https://t.co/C5X2xhI1Au
He‚Äôs unstoppable! Salt Lake City resident @NickGoepper has earned his way onto the podium in every Olympics he‚Äôs competed in. Congratulations on earning silver, Nick! https://t.co/Yt5NP2LCb0
Park City resident and @UUTah student Alex Hall could not be beaten. Alex, congratulations on an incredible run and well-deserved gold medal. You make us proud! https://t.co/Ch5ovV7Z9R
Utahns are dominating the podium in Beijing. Congratulations to Utah freestyle skiers Alex Hall and @NickGoepper on your 1-2 finish in slopestyle! https://t.co/XCrtANVgll

Because China's geopolitical power is growing at an alarming rate, we must be united with allies like Australia to maintain global order & promote our values abroad. Met with @AmbCKennedy, Amb. to Australia nominee, to discuss efforts to push back against the CCP's malign regime. https://t.co/JHeCrisEpS

Park City‚Äôs Casey Dawson found his way to the podium with a bronze medal, following a whirlwind of delays in getting to Beijing. Congratulations to Casey and the entire team! https://t.co/tUrYREZm3S

Congratulations to @UUtah alum Megan Nick on earning @TeamUSA‚Äôs second-ever medal in women‚Äôs aerial skiing! No doubt that you are helping to inspire the next generation of @usskiteam competitors. https://t.co/gTLv7xV1Cu

Utah and the American West are facing historic numbers of wildfires. The Cottonwood decision places a huge burden on the @forestservice at a time when they should be focused on wildfire management. The Administration must resolve this issue quickly. https://t.co/ZCUeHjmp75

Congratulations to @BobsledKaillie and @eamslider24 on your history-making performances in monobob! We‚Äôre immensely proud to have you both on @TeamUSA. Nothing better than hearing our national anthem played in Beijing. https://t.co/N2EO3zY1Rp

Tonight‚Äôs Super Bowl game will feature a special appearance by a F-35A from @HAFB in Utah! Especially grateful for our brave airmen as we celebrate the @usairforce‚Äôs 75 years of valiant service to our nation üá∫üá∏ https://t.co/MAfaIZriEG

Congratulations to Salt Lake resident Erin Jackson on her historic win! What an amazing accomplishment, @ErinJackson480‚Äîyou will be an inspiration to so many. We could not be more proud! https://t.co/EbMYnwg5Hx

Our Olympic and Paralympic athletes‚Äîincluding their families‚Äîhave made tremendous sacrifices to compete at the Olympics. Shared an exciting moment cheering on @TeamUSA with our returned athletes and families of athletes competing now in Beijing. https://t.co/C2CF4BxPdV

It‚Äôs unequivocal‚Äîthe 2002 Salt Lake Olympics had a foundational impact on winter sports here in Utah and around the world. What a wonderful evening it‚Äôs been celebrating our state‚Äôs heartening Olympic legacy with fellow Utahns. https://t.co/cDn5gjevJV

The Olympics display the greatest qualities of the human spirit. At the 2002 Games, we were continually inspired by the commitment, unity, and passion of the athletes & volunteers. Proud to join our 2002 Olympic Committee team in commemorating 20 years since the Salt Lake Games. https://t.co/zdM0gzbpHl
Congratulations to @WestminsterSLC alum @LindsJacobellis and @nickbaumgartner on making Olympic history. Your experience and hard work rewarded with a gold medal! https://t.co/RWOXkgzVll

Utah remains a national leader in job creation and business growth, and @NucorCorp is a great example of that. Enjoyed visiting their steel plant in Plymouth, UT to learn more about their approach to sustainable steel production. https://t.co/6hWY9xEcAv

Remaining competitive with China will require significant investments in our country‚Äôs manufacturing capacity‚Äîa core piece of our infrastructure bill. Grateful for @NucorCorp‚Äôs steel operation in Utah, which helps counter China‚Äôs predation in the global steel market. https://t.co/7loru0Djz2

With thousands of full-time employees in Draper and South Jordan and over 90,000 sellers throughout Utah, @eBay is a significant contributor to our state‚Äôs booming economy. Sat down with CEO Jamie Iannone to discuss ways we can better support our small e-commerce merchants. https://t.co/KDuUHloZ2F
Congratulations to Park City-based ski jumper Chris Lillis and to this amazing team for securing gold for @TeamUSA! https://t.co/rxaul6gdjR

Flawless, artistic performance from Utah‚Äôs @nathanwchen. Nathan, your efforts on and off of the ice exemplify the boundless nature of the human spirit. Congrats on gold‚Äîthe Quad King delivers again! https://t.co/bRX4yRuHpc

Thanks to pro-growth policies and a talented workforce, Utah is an excellent place to start and grow a business. Enjoyed meeting with Utah's veteran-owned @blckriflecoffee to learn about their successful company and thank them for their work to support veterans in our state. https://t.co/7MnF3Sm8et

Our bipartisan infrastructure bill‚Äìnow law‚Äìwas designed to meet the needs of growing states like Utah. Enjoyed meeting with leadership from @WasatchCouncil to discuss how we can best implement funding & provisions from the bill for infrastructure projects along the Wasatch Front. https://t.co/ORZdsuHjkQ

Structuring federal family programs against the freedoms and best interests of parents is a huge mistake. We must ensure families can make their own choices‚Äîwhich is the foundation of my Family Security Act. This is critical for stronger families, culture, and a stronger economy. https://t.co/Kuc7HNvh8z

Getting the bipartisan infrastructure bill passed was a success; but now, it must be implemented as Congress intended. Met with @SecretaryPete to discuss our shared implementation objectives & I look forward to working with him to ensure that Utah's infrastructure needs are met. https://t.co/3fOfLxEIYh

Reforms to existing federal programs to help improve the lives of children and help American families must be done on a bipartisan basis. To deliver real impact, we must work together. https://t.co/g1V6PQb6Rv

Existing family programs aren‚Äôt having the kind of impact they ought to have on our children, given the amount we are spending. My Family Security Act would restructure federal programs to make them more effective at improving children's lives, without increasing spending. https://t.co/LnMTLxj462

Congratulations to @WestminsterSLC alum and Park City resident Colby Stevenson on a well-earned silver medal! @colbyskier, your grit and¬†perseverance¬†was put on full display in Beijing‚Äîinspiring so many. We‚Äôre immensely proud! https://t.co/WRK1eOXn2Q
Inspiring performance by @WestminsterSLC alum and 5x Olympian @LindsJacobellis. Congratulations on an incredible finish‚Äîand securing the first gold medal for @TeamUSA! https://t.co/SgLnegmY9M

Community colleges are required to report graduation rates that don‚Äôt often reflect reality. Met with @SaltLakeCC board members to discuss the Time For Completion Act, a bill to ensure reported data accurately reflect the diversity of students who attend our community colleges. https://t.co/m9CQ7rzec3

Parents deserve the right to choose how they will raise their children, whether that's having both parents in the workforce or having one stay at home. My Family Security Act prioritizes parents' choice‚Äîproviding financial help without penalizing marriage or stay-at-home parents https://t.co/6BIivU2bYI

During the 2002 Winter Olympics, Utah‚Äôs spirit of service was on full display. We wondered: would we find the 25,000 volunteers needed? When we opened the application portal, we got our answer: Almost 50,000 signed up.https://t.co/aAvcVdZJDv
Thanks both to the people of Utah who volunteered and to the Olympians themselves, the 2002 Olympic Winter Games touched our hearts and inspired millions. https://t.co/dOwvDaA3zQ

The Utah spirit was on full display throughout the 2002 Games. Utahns across the state stepped forward in ways I won‚Äôt forget‚Äîserving as volunteers to ensure athletes, teams, and visitors from around the world were cared for. https://t.co/aAvcVdZJDv

Continuing in his family‚Äôs medal-winning legacy at the Winter Olympics, @WestminsterSLC alum Ryan Cochran-Siegle is taking home silver! Congratulations to Ryan on this great accomplishment. https://t.co/qOFVPLqnkC

We're still seeing a lack of capacity in medical countermeasure manufacturing‚Äîlike testing‚Äîmore than two years into COVID. My bill with @SenatorHassan would provide public health agencies with tools to support critical manufacturing on an ongoing basis. https://t.co/oVdrMYRU75

Breathtaking performances from @USFigureSkating. Congratulations to Utah native @nathanwchen and the entire team on this well-deserved silver! Nathan, we‚Äôll be¬†cheering you on as you¬†compete in¬†the individual events! https://t.co/9U3vBiAIaO
Congratulations to Salt Lake resident @JaeBird96 on taking home silver in women‚Äôs moguls! That was one seriously impressive‚Äîand fast‚Äîrun. https://t.co/CFQnhOkytK

Utah continues to lead as the hub of winter sports‚ÄîI am beyond proud that more than one third of @TeamUSA athletes have close ties to Utah. I cannot wait to see what they accomplish at the 2022 Winter @Olympics. https://t.co/r8pIQImBjV

To all of the Utahns‚Äîand all of the athletes‚Äîcompeting for @TeamUSA: best of luck! There is no doubt that you all will make our great nation proud. I look forward to hearing our national anthem played many times in Beijing. We're cheering you on! https://t.co/KAD9AlWasg

Tonight, as we watch the @Olympics opening ceremonies, Salt Lake resident @BrittanyBowe will be leading @TeamUSA as a flag bearer. A Utahn has now carried the flag in back-to-back Games. I can‚Äôt wait to see our nation‚Äôs flag flying in Beijing along with our incredible Olympians! https://t.co/y2GOJ3Muan

The International Olympic Committee should never have awarded the 2022 Winter Olympic Games to Beijing. Laws enforced by the Chinese Communist Party put our athletes in unacceptable circumstances, where they must choose between personal safety or free expression. https://t.co/6NR98GRB1p

The world is different than it was in the 1960s, when the U.S. was responsible for 40% of the economy worldwide. Now it's 24%. If we want malevolent actors like China and Russia to abide by the rules of global order, we must link arms with our friends and allies around the world. https://t.co/x3TseisvRG

More important than who wins an election is that we have elections, and a democracy, in the first place. As authoritarian regimes around the world continue to gain ground, the United States cannot falter on principles of truth in our elections. https://t.co/ZoFoR4WcGq

It's unacceptable that our Olympians are in a setting where any criticism of the CCP violates Chinese law. The Olympic Games must never be awarded to authoritarian states that use the Olympics and its athletes as a platform for propaganda and jeopardize athletes' safety. https://t.co/GkEgj8xjU4

China is closely watching our response to Russia's threats in Ukraine‚Äîusing it as a case study of what they could get away with in Taiwan. A strong, united effort from the U.S and our allies will send a clear warning to authoritarian governments around the world. https://t.co/M5voKttkVs

The only time Putin is lying is when his lips are moving. Anything that comes out of his mouth should be taken with a large grain of salt. In the event of a Russian invasion of Ukraine, we must be totally prepared for a unified response with our allies. https://t.co/eujSMqyPbG
Live now‚Üí I‚Äôm joining @IgnatiusPost on @PostLive for a discussion on foreign policy, including the rising threats from Russia and China. Tune in: https://t.co/AAAPkJKplE

Looking forward to joining @IgnatiusPost soon to discuss the growing threats from Russia and China, the importance of strengthening NATO, the upcoming diplomatic boycott of the Beijing Olympics, and the rise of authoritarianism around the world. https://t.co/dR9KZZf7rv

In keeping with Utah's rich Olympic tradition, our state continues to serve as the center of winter sports in North America. Just look at the number of athletes competing this year with close Utah ties‚Äîmore than a third of @TeamUSA! Looking forward to seeing Utahns on the podium. https://t.co/o5tb2aCRmX

Deficit spending at its current pace is a precursor to economic calamity‚Äîinaction on our national debt comes at a high cost to the American people. We must be able to keep up with nations like China and maintain our lead as the guide for democracy around the world. https://t.co/7tYFqD6hdJ

.@USDOT guidance prohibiting the use of bipartisan infrastructure bill funds to increase highway capacity flies in the face of the intent of our bill. Rapidly growing states like Utah are in need of expanded highways. The Administration must ensure this is implemented correctly. https://t.co/YfiVEjdBRe

The @SenateYouth Program recognizes some of the nation‚Äôs top student leaders, including Arundhati and Neve from Salt Lake City. Honored to meet with them to discuss their experience participating in the program and their goals as part of our nation's next generation of leaders. https://t.co/toYAHDlDaC

Russia and China are actively involved in upending world order, infiltrating democracies around the world and encouraging authoritarian alternatives. We must develop a strategy which supports democracy and fends off the inevitable draw of authoritarianism around the world. https://t.co/KJx5sBDtlS

Militant coups are replacing democratically-elected governments around the world, and Russia and China are actively engaged in the process‚Äîexploiting nations for their own political and economic advantages. We cannot ignore their actions to suppress global freedom and democracy. https://t.co/e1jUGITeLi

Families know that financial pressures don‚Äôt wait for a new baby to arrive. Allowing pregnant moms to claim the Child Tax Credit for their unborn children will help alleviate some of the costs through pregnancy & in the first months of their child‚Äôs life.https://t.co/PqZLqSyaE3

Proud to unveil my new and improved Senate website! https://t.co/JdLQJZ36wI has been redesigned from the ground up‚Äîmaking it easier for Utahns to contact my office, submit requests, and stay up to date with my efforts in Washington. Check it out ‚Üì https://t.co/M4ev0bSOEn

On #HolocaustRemembranceDay, we honor the 11 million victims‚Äîincluding 6 million Jews‚Äîwho were senselessly murdered during the Holocaust. As #WeRemember these victims and survivors, we must reaffirm our dedication to eradicating anti-Semitism here at home and around the world.

Faith-based child welfare providers perform vital services for hundreds of thousands of foster children nationwide. The Administration‚Äôs reversal of protections for faith-based adoption & foster care agencies places ideology over the interests of children. https://t.co/ut3eL6NZtd

Parents know what is best for their kids. Proud to help introduce a resolution designating this week as National School Choice Week because every family should have the freedom to choose the model of education which best meets the needs of their children. https://t.co/zvPf4TRjq4

All human life is sacred. I stand with the women and men across the country who‚Äîin the spirit of compassion and mercy‚Äî#MarchForLife. We must serve as a voice for the voiceless, and I remain committed to protecting the innocent and defending the dignity of life. https://t.co/bJ6wjDLktG

I want an election system that allows every eligible citizen in every state in America to be able to exercise their right to vote in every single election. Democrats‚Äô partisan election reform legislation doesn't focus on the real threats to our elections and our democracy. https://t.co/lXE8rIYw40

We should work on a bipartisan basis to tackle these issues and safeguard our elections. Democrats' legislation doesn't focus on the real threats‚Äîthe corruption in counting ballots, election certification, and Congressional provisions for accepting & counting a slate of electors. https://t.co/WjIBfmU6Aq

The President and some of my Democratic colleagues have ventured from political overstatement and hyperbole to deep hysteria. Their cataclysmic predictions for failing to support their entirely partisan election reform legislation are far beyond the pale. https://t.co/c2Qblffhnn

Democrats' election reform legislation:
¬†
‚Üí weakens voter ID
‚Üí makes it easier to cheat
‚Üí weakens voter registration safeguards
‚Üí uses federal funding for campaigns
‚Üí¬†requires states to allow¬†felons to vote
¬†
Let's be clear: this is a partisan takeover of our elections. https://t.co/mZF5tabDpv

Speaking of Democrats‚Äô hyperbole & hysteria, @SenAlexPadilla & others routinely cite claims that GOP legislatures passed 34 restrictive voter access laws last year. Checking facts, I looked into the one of those 34, from Utah: it requires removal of dead people from voter rolls.

People who want voter ID are not racists.
 
People who don‚Äôt want federal funding of campaigns aren‚Äôt Bull Connor.
 
And people who insist that vote drop boxes be monitored aren‚Äôt Jefferson Davis. https://t.co/okMzaWuGqg
Live soon‚Üí I‚Äôll be speaking on the Senate floor about Democrats‚Äô¬†attempts at a partisan takeover of our federal elections.¬†Watch here:¬†https://t.co/mlS6RtPeXb

Today marks the beginning of the General Session for the Utah legislature, @utahhousereps and @utahsenate. Best wishes to @BradWilsonGOP, @JStuartAdams, and the entire legislative body as they work through the issues most pressing to Utahns. Thanks for your service to our state!

Dr. Martin Luther King Jr. spoke: ‚ÄúLove is the only force capable of transforming an enemy into a friend.‚Äù Disparaging others will only deepen the rift that divides us. May we honor Dr. King's legacy by demonstrating respect, understanding, and grace for all of God's people. https://t.co/G0sK0MRgId

Instead of trying to unilaterally re-write the election rules in every single state, Democrats should work with Republicans on reforms to our electoral system. Democrats current efforts are nothing more than a political play to appeal to their base. https://t.co/sdvQ8urpPh

Russia is currently a gas station parading as a country‚Äîand Putin is trying to re-establish the old Soviet Union. This can‚Äôt be allowed to happen. The U.S. must work with our allies to strengthen NATO. We need a strong NATO not just for Russia, but for the emergence of China. https://t.co/8umYD9orAw

Democrats are attempting a federal takeover of our elections, which were deliberately left up to the states to keep autocracy from taking hold in America. I'm working w/ a bipartisan group of colleagues on election reforms because any change to our voting laws must be bipartisan. https://t.co/cCZGufnMHz

Senate Republicans are willing to work with the President on bipartisan solutions to the challenges facing Americans‚Äîfixing inflation, family security, health care, education, immigration. Passing the bipartisan infrastructure bill proved that there are things we can do together. https://t.co/vbr3MRZaoT

The 1st year of the Biden Administration has been 52 bad weeks:

-7% inflation
-botched Afghanistan withdrawal
-COVID resurgence & testing shortage
-disaster at our southern border
 
POTUS needs to stop trying to transform America and work to unify the country, like he promised. https://t.co/xhrhASZC6c

It must be made very clear to Putin: There will be extraordinary consequences should any action be taken to invade Ukraine or overthrow its government. And these consequences must be in coordination with our allies. Shutting down Nord Stream 2 would be a good place to start. https://t.co/9782qrLYin

Russia is trying to blackmail Europe while playing a victim. Nord Stream 2 gives Putin more leverage over Ukraine and makes Western Europe more dependent on Russia. I'll continue to work with my colleagues on ways to push back against Russian aggression. https://t.co/WmzhwuBHYK

It‚Äôs absurd to claim that to 'save a democracy,' a party that represents barely half the country is entitled, entirely by itself, to trample the rules of its senior democratic institution. Legislation of consequence must be a product of bipartisan compromise to be effective. https://t.co/NVyENHdNgx

Our country is sharply divided‚Äîand there are still those who believe the lie that the 2020 election was stolen by Democrats. Now imagine the anger and division that would be ignited if Democrats re-write, with no Republican involvement whatsoever, the voting laws in this country. https://t.co/QEMxNhDf8g

Best of luck to our freestyle skiers competing this week at the Intermountain Healthcare Freestyle International in Park City. We‚Äôre cheering you on and hope you enjoy the ‚Äògreatest snow on earth!‚Äô https://t.co/Fz3ed9p9QX

Eliminating the filibuster‚Äîthe 60-vote threshold‚Äîmakes little sense when Democrats' legislative priorities can't even get 50 votes. Efforts to abolish the filibuster seem like a solution in search of a problem‚Äîand one Democrats may soon regret very much. https://t.co/6OzyQamj6u

Many claim the filibuster is racist, yet I don't recall a single claim from Democrats that employing the filibuster was racist when they were in the minority. Now, with the barest of majorities, they are conveniently ignoring their own impassioned defense of the filibuster. https://t.co/hNSx99oICy

The Senate is one of our vital democratic institutions, and the power given to the minority is one of its defining features. Eliminating the filibuster would give way to extremism by removing the requirement for political consensus, which is in Americans‚Äô best interests. https://t.co/7Af2SFRXs5
I‚Äôll be speaking on the Senate floor about Democrats‚Äô radical attempts to remake our governmental institutions by eliminating the Senate filibuster. Watch live: https://t.co/YUtlCf5Kwk

Successful businesses rely on daily information to make sound decisions‚Äîthe government should follow suit for tracking COVID-19. We must find a better solution to collect and synthesize pandemic data on a daily basis so our federal agencies can operate more effectively. https://t.co/tOYWv37HJB

The lack of COVID tests available amid the Omicron surge is a result of the Administration's failure to build up testing capacity while infections were relatively low. Given the uncertainty of this virus, we must ensure that we're prepared for the new variants and future surges. https://t.co/ZN9Uk8gkK2
After 126 years of statehood, Utah shines brighter than ever. Grateful to call our beautiful state home. Happy birthday, Utah! https://t.co/IqjPbxQAO8

In stark contrast to Democrats' social spending bill, our bipartisan infrastructure bill invests in our physical infrastructure without raising taxes or adding trillions to our debt. Proud to have worked with a bipartisan group of senators to negotiate and pass our bill in 2021. https://t.co/zkjTYV8YgN

As we plan for the year ahead, I remain committed to addressing our rising national debt, the threat China poses to the global order, our changing climate, and fighting for Utah priorities in Washington. It is an honor to serve Utahns in the U.S. Senate. https://t.co/iUFVaW3gkn

Despite a somewhat somber year with unpredictable challenges, I was honored to serve the people of Utah by introducing and passing several bills in 2021 that will make a positive difference in the lives of Utahns and all Americans. My reflection on 2021‚Üí¬†https://t.co/iUFVaW3gkn

I will continue to fight for Utah values and priorities in the new year and oppose bad policies that would result in higher taxes, more spending and debt, and the federal takeover of some of our core institutions. Read my 2021 Year in Review report here:¬†https://t.co/PnSbvzz8dB https://t.co/Sy4EODuJtV

This year, my efforts focused on addressing long-term infrastructure needs, the increasing China threat, and helping Utah tackle climate issues. My team and I also assisted with 1,800 casework claims, responded to 720,000 pieces of mail & met with hundreds of constituent groups.

Congratulations to Sgt. Breanna J. Jessop from Myton, Utah, for being named @the_USO Soldier of the Year! Sgt. Jessop‚Äîwe‚Äôre proud of your valiant efforts to help Afghan children at a time when they were most vulnerable. I encourage all to read her inspiring and heroic story. https://t.co/svZYvewN2d

The United States will not standby as the Chinese Communist Party commits genocide against the Uyghurs. Our bipartisan Uyghur Forced Labor Prevention Act, now law, will help keep China accountable by ensuring no goods made with Uyghur slave labor are sold in American markets. https://t.co/YL0ZweXVLd

This year, we‚Äôve seen tragedies around the world and faced difficulties here at home. Despite it all, many have stepped up to ensure the well-being of others. It‚Äôs my hope that we find peace and comfort in those who make the world a better place. Merry Christmas, Happy Holidays!

Now that it‚Äôs clear ‚ÄúBuild Back Better‚Äù isn‚Äôt moving forward & with bipartisan opposition to extending the President‚Äôs ill-crafted Child Tax Credit, the Administration has an opportunity to actually work with Republicans & Democrats on lasting, fiscally-responsible family policy. https://t.co/6ePaFrYciA

Thanks to our bipartisan infrastructure bill, long-needed resources will be delivered to Utah communities like Stockton, which has awaited funding to address critical cleanup of contaminated soils. Proud to have helped negotiate this legislation. https://t.co/1CAII2PhBd

Utahns understand the need for better solutions to curb wildfires. Thanks to the bipartisan infrastructure bill, a commission aimed at improving strategies to prevent, mitigate and respond to wildfires‚Äîwhich I proposed with @SenMarkKelly‚Äîis now a reality. https://t.co/47QxNtyxf5

With record unemployment numbers well below the national average, Utah continues to lead the nation in economic vitality and job security. Kudos to the hardworking Utahns and employers in our state for their commitment to job creation and growth. https://t.co/D4wDK4XOgk

Great to see @TeamUSA back in the historic @UtahOlympicOval‚Äîthe best venue for speed skating. Best of luck to the athletes competing in the trials this weekend‚Äîwe‚Äôre cheering you on! https://t.co/aJmYB9pLXu

Proud that this bill has become law. The Congressional Gold Medal is the highest honor Congress can bestow, and we remain forever indebted to the 13 heroes we lost during the terrorist attacks outside the Kabul airport this summer, including Utah‚Äôs own Staff Sgt. Taylor Hoover. https://t.co/A50edD3hGN

The Chinese Communist Party's genocide of the Uyghur people is one of the greatest human rights atrocities of our generation. Proud that our Uyghur Forced Labor Prevention Act is finally set to become law! Goods made with Uyghur slave labor have no place being sold in America. https://t.co/aDb7zvw9ml
